channel.title: CVE Feed for ClusterLabs -- pcs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ClusterLabs -- pcs

item.title: CVE-2017-2661|2024-08-05T14:02:07.221Z -- clusterlabs -- pcs
item.description: ClusterLabs pcs before version 0.9.157 is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting vulnerability due to improper validation of Node name field when creating new cluster or adding existing cluster.
